prompts: What's your idea of a perfect date?
What's your favorite way to spend a weekend?
What's the most adventurous thing you've ever done?
What's your favorite book/movie/TV show and why?
What do you value most in a relationship?
What are you looking for in a partner?
What's your idea of a fun night out?
What's your favorite hobby or activity?

characters.name: Harold the herald
characters.description: He thought this was normal speed dating.
characters.rule: Read the messages sent to the screen.

characters.name: Jester
characters.description: They used to serve a king. But now he's ready to serve you ;)
